alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 3:41PM CDT until August 15 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Southwestern Henry County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 341 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Blue Springs, or 12 miles northeast of Ozark, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Headland, Newville, Bells Crossroads, Skipperville, Echo, Kirkland Crossroads, Blackwood, Capps, Roberts Crossroads, Snells Crossroads, Barefield Crossroads, Murphy Station, Beamon, Goldberg Field, Dancey, Ward Bridge and Bertha. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
